data.name: CustomKernelQ
data.value: Do you want to flash the custom kernel?

data.name: CustomWarning
data.value: You need to flash the custom kernel to your mini. This is only required once. Do you want to continue?

data.name: DeleteGame
data.value: Do you really want to delete "{0}" game?

data.name: DoneYouCanUpload
data.value: Done! You can upload games to your mini now.

data.name: DoYouWantCancel
data.value: Do you want to cancel the current operation?

data.name: DumpKernelQ
data.value: Do you want to dump the kernel?

data.name: MapperNotSupported
data.value: "{0}" uses mapper #{1} but this mapper is not supported by the NES Mini and the game will probably not start with the default emulator. But it should work if other emulator's module installed. Do you want to add this game?

data.name: MD5Failed
data.value: Kernel dumped but the MD5 checksum is unknown:

data.name: MD5Failed2
data.value: The kernel is already patched or it's an unknown revision. Please send this message to me (press Ctrl+C). Continue at your own risk.

data.name: NoKernelWarning
data.value: First, dump the kernel image of your mini. You only need to do this once. Do you want to continue?

data.name: NoKernelYouNeed
data.value: No kernel dump found. You need to dump the kernel first.

data.name: OriginalKernelQ
data.value: Do you want to flash the original kernel?

data.name: ReplaceKernelQ
data.value: You already have the kernel dump. If you REALLY want to replace the backup of your kernel and you REALLY understand what you are doing, delete the "hakchi2/dump" folder manually.

data.name: VerifyFailed
data.value: Verify failed :O This is not good.

data.name: PleaseTryAgainUSB
data.value: If this problem persists, try using another USB port or cable.

data.name: Donate
data.value: If you like this app, you can donate to me. You can find my PayPal in the "About" box.

data.name: FirstRun
data.value:
Hello there! I'm very glad that you are using hakchi2!
It's very simple to use. Just click "Add more games", select some ROMs, press "Synchronize" to upload games to the console internal memory, or press "Export" to use USB HOST mode, and follow the instructions. Good luck!

data.name: KernelDumped
data.value: Your original kernel has been saved in a special area of your console.

data.name: DeletePreset
data.value: Do you really want to delete the "{0}" preset?

data.name: FourScreenNotSupported
data.value: Oops, {0} uses four-screen mode (i.e. the game has additional VRAM memory in the cartridge), and this feature is not supported by the NES Mini. The game will probably not start. But it should work if other emulator's module installed. Do you want to add this game anyway?

data.name: InputPreset
data.value: Please input a preset name for the current games selection.

data.name: UninstallFactoryNote
data.value: Done! Don't forget to perform a factory reset if you want to delete all Suspend Points.

data.name: UninstallQ1
data.value: Do you really want to remove all traces of hakchi2 and return your mini to its original state?

data.name: UninstallQ2
data.value: Do you want to flash the original kernel now?

data.name: GameGenieFormatError
data.value: Invalid Game Genie code "{0}" for game "{1}".

data.name: GameGenieNotFound
data.value: Can't apply Game Genie code "{0}" to game "{1}" - value not found. Maybe this code is for another game?

data.name: PatchQ
data.value: There is patch for "{0}". Do you want to patch this game?

data.name: AutofireHelp1
data.value: Hold Select+A/B for a second to enable/disable autofire A/B.

data.name: ExtraArgsInfo
data.value: You can add global command-line arguments which will be appended to all games including the original. This is only for experts!

data.name: DownloadAllCoversTitle
data.value: Downloading box art for all games (I'm feeling lucky!)

data.name: GGCodeDelete
data.value: Do you want to delete "{0}" code?

data.value: This code already exists. Do you want to edit it?

data.name: DeleteElement
data.value: Do you really want to delete "{0}"?

data.name: FolderContent
data.value: Deleted content will be moved to the Recycle Bin. You can delete this folder permanently or move the games to other folders.

data.name: FoldersSaveQ
data.value: Do you want to save this folder structure?

data.name: NewGamesUnsorted
data.value: New games are moved to the "Unsorted" folder.

data.name: DeleteElements
data.value: Do you really want to delete {0} elements?

data.name: SelectModsInstall
data.value: Select the modules to install on your mini

data.name: SelectModsUninstall
data.value: Select the modules to remove from your mini

data.name: MemoryFull
data.value: Sorry, there are {0} of games, it's too much.

data.name: MemoryStats
data.value: Total writable memory size: {0:F1}MB|Available memory for games: {1:F1}MB|Used by saves: {2:F1}MB|Used by other files: {3:F1}MB

data.name: DeleteSavesQ
data.value: Do you really want to delete those save-states?

data.name: NoTelnet
data.value: Can't start Telnet client, seems like it's disabled. You need to enable it first, you can do it in “Control Panel“ -> “Programs“ -> "Turn Windows features on or off".

data.name: DownloadCoverQ
data.value: Do you want to try to download box art for "{0}"?

data.name: Need3rdPartyEmulator
data.value: Oops, it seems like "{0}" is not going not work correctly with the original emulator. Do you want to use a 3rd party emulator for this game (it needs to be installed)?

data.name: FlashNandCQ
data.value: Do you want to flash the user data? It will replace all user data.

data.name: TooManyPerFolder
data.value: Warning! It's not recommended to store so many games per folder.

data.name: ResetOriginalGamesQ
data.value: Do you really want to undo all customization on original games for {0}?

data.name: CannotDeleteTempFolder
data.value: Error deleting temp folder. Please try again.

data.name: LinkedGamesQ
data.value: Do you want to make linked games?

data.name: PermanentlyDeleteQ
ScanningCovers
data.value: Scanning art folder for box art...

data.name: VersionRevisionNotice
data.value: INTERNAL VERSION FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY

data.name: FlashUbootNormalQ
data.value: Do you really want to flash the NORMAL MODE uboot?

data.name: FlashUbootSDQ
data.value: Do you really want to flash the SD MODE uboot?

data.name: ResetROMHeaderSelectedGamesQ
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset/repair selected games' SFROM headers?

data.name: DownloadSfromTool
data.value:
In order to use SFROM Tool with hakchi2 CE, you need to: - Visit /u/DarkAkuma's website - Download the latest version of his tool - Install the package in {0}\sfrom_tool
Do you want to download the tool?
http://darkakuma.z-net.us/p/sfromtool.html

data.name: ApplyChangesQ
data.value: Do you want to apply your changes?

data.name: CustomGameCodeAlreadyExists
data.value: App code already exists, please use a different code!

data.name: CustomGameNeedValidData
data.value: You need to enter a valid app code and name!

data.name: DiscardChangesQ
data.value: Are you sure you want to discard your changes?

data.name: PleaseUpdate
data.value: Until you install the necessary updates, you will likely experience errors while attempting to use this program. Please update to receive full compatibility.

data.name: SystemEligibleForRootfsUpdate
data.value: Your system's kernel scripts are out of date and can be updated. Would you like to update the custom kernel scripts now?

data.name: SystemRequiresReflash
data.value: Your system's custom kernel is out of date and requires a reflash before you can use this program. Would you like to flash the custom kernel now?

data.name: SystemRequiresRootfsUpdate
data.value: Your system's kernel scripts are out of date and it requires a memboot before you can use this program. Would you like to memboot the custom kernel now?

data.name: FormatNandCQ
data.value: Do you want to format the user data partition? It will erase all user data.

data.name: ErrorRestoringAllOriginalGames
data.value: An error occured while restoring the original games. You can always use File -> Restore original games later on to try again for the games collection you intend to use them in.

data.name: UninstallNote
data.value: Done. If everything went well, your mini should be back to running the stock kernel.

data.name: CannotSyncToNonMultiBoot
data.value: You cannot synchronize a {0} games collection onto your currently running mini ({1}). Please switch to the matching games collection, or switch to using "separate games for multiboot" mode, in order to proceed.

data.name: PleaseConnectYourDevice
data.value: Please connect your mini in order to proceed. Note that you must also install the custom kernel, using the options in the Kernel menu.

data.name: RepairSelectedGamesQ
data.value: Are you sure you want to attempt repair selected games? (This could break some games, especially if there weren't imported by hakchi2. Only attempt on broken games.)

data.name: RecoveryModeMessage
data.value:
Your system is now in recovery mode, here you can telnet into the system to run any command you want, you can also use FTP to transfer files.
In order to mount your base partitions, you'll need to run the command "hakchi mount_base"

data.name: FactoryResetQ
data.value:
Are you sure you want to restore factory settings?
All data will be erased and the stock kernel will be flashed.
Continue?

data.name: CannotProceedCannotInteract
data.value: Your kernel or scripts are out of date. Please update before synchronizing games

data.name: CannotProceedMinimalMemboot
data.value: Your mini is currently in recovery state, cannot proceed. To exit this state, use Tools -> Reboot

data.name: FactoryResetNote
data.value: Done! All traces of hakchi have been removed and your mini has been reset to factory settings.

data.name: ResetQ
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset and repair hakchi on your mini?

data.name: SyncMultibootWarning
data.value: You have {0} of games already synchronized on your mini (non separated for multiboot). Proceeding will erase those. Are you sure?

data.name: SyncNonMultibootWarning
data.value: You have {0} of games already synchronized on your mini (separated for multiboot). Proceeding will erase those. Are you sure?

data.name: SaveStructureQ
data.value: Are you sure you want to sync all your games collections' structure settings to the currently displayed settings?

data.name: JustWaitForYourMini
data.value: Just wait until it power cycles.

data.name: MakeSureYourMiniIsConnected
data.value: Make sure your mini is properly connected via USB cable.

data.name: SfromToolInstalled
data.value: SFROM Tool has been installed. Your games will now be converted with it. You can also drag and drop .CNP patches to add them easily.

data.name: ErrorImportingGame
data.value: Error importing game "{0}". Please verify that the file is valid and not corrupted.

data.name: CustomKernelInstalledQ
data.value: Did you already flash the custom kernel on your mini?

data.name: DisableUSBWarning
data.value: This will disable any OTG USB device plugged into your mini. Are you sure you want to disable USB-HOST?

data.name: FinishBootSequenceQ
data.value: You are currently running in recovery mode. Would you like to finish normal boot procedure instead of rebooting?

data.name: DumpOriginalKernelCompleteMessage
data.value: Please note, this dump file is only useful for legacy hakchi2 or hakchi2 ce versions, it is not useful for the current version.

data.name: DumpOriginalKernelNotFound
data.value: The original kernel could not be found on the system.

data.name: DumpOriginalKernelInvalid
data.value: The original kernel file you've supplied is not a validated original kernel.

data.name: WaitingForDeviceTakingALongTime
data.value:
Your device is taking a long time to reboot.
You can wait some more and if it comes back online, you should see "Recovery mode" in the title bar. In that case, you can try the same action again, or use "Tools > Reboot" to get back to normal operation.
The most common reason for console taking too long to reboot is a Firewall, such as Windows Firewall, you can add an exception for hakchi2 ce to fix this issue.
Other reasons may include VPNs blocking traffic to the local network and Windows failing to detect the RNDIS driver correctly.

data.name: RecoveryModeCloseWarning
data.value: Your mini is currently in recovery mode. You will not be able to turn it off normally. Do you want to finish boot sequence so it returns to normal afterwards?

data.name: FirmwareSwitched
data.value: Upon rebooting, your running mini should be running the selected firmware "{0}"!

data.name: AlreadyInRecoveryQ
data.value: You're already in recovery mode, do you want to reload the recovery image?

data.name: CannotProceedCannotSync
data.value: Your hakchi installation is running Clovershell daemon. It is not safe to sync games with Clovershell. Please uninstall this module in order to sync games safely!

data.name: ReplaceFollowingFileQ
data.value:
Do you want to replace the following file?
{0}

data.name: ShowExperimentalQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to show experimental mods?

data.name: UnsavedChangesQ
data.value: You have unsaved changes, do you want to save them?

data.name: CopyFilesFromNandQ2
data.value: Do you want to copy your saves and games from NAND to the SD card?

data.name: CopyingNandDataToSDCard

data.value:
Are you sure you want to format the SD card inserted in the classic?

data.value:
Would you like to expand the data partition, this will give you approximately {0} of additional free space.
There is a small chance of data loss, please make sure you have your saves backed up.
This may affect the compatibility of other hacks.

data.value:
Would you like to expand the data partition, this will give you approximately {0} of additional free space.
There is a small chance of data loss, please make sure you have your saves backed up.

data.value: Do you want to expand the data partition?

data.name: AddPrefixMessage
data.value: Enter a prefix to prepend to the name of all selected games, a colon and space will automatically be added to the end of the prefix.

data.name: RemovePrefixMessage
data.value: Enter a prefix to remove from the start of all selected games, a colon and space will automatically be added to the end of the prefix.

data.name: ChooseWhatYouWouldLikeToScrape
data.value: Choose what you would like to scrape, this will replace any existing information.

data.name: ThisWillReplaceAnyCustomInformationAndArtworkFromScraper
data.value:
This will replace any custom information and artwork with that from the scraper.
Are you sure?
